original: @171b * // mchod rten bye ba gdab pa'i cho ga la /
analyzed: @171b * // mchod rten bye ba gdab pa'i cho ga la /
translated: The ritual for planting ten million stūpas:

original: pa'am / phyag rgyar btab la mchod rten bye ba btab pa'i nang du bcug na mchod rten thams cad 'bar ro //
analyzed: pa'am / phyag rgyar btab la mchod rten bye ba btab pa'i nang du bcug na mchod rten thams cad 'bar ro //
translated: or stamp them with the mudrā. If you insert them inside ten million stūpas that have been planted, all the stūpas will blaze.

original: de nas mchod rten gcig nas bye ba'i bar du snga phyir btab pa de dag mchod rten chen po gcig gi nang du bcug ste /
analyzed: de nas mchod rten gcig nas bye ba'i bar du snga phyir btab pa de dag mchod rten chen po gcig gi nang du bcug ste /
translated: Then, from one stūpa up to ten million stūpas planted earlier and later, insert them inside one great stūpa.

original: 'phan shing la 'phan rings bsgrang ba ni /
analyzed: 'phan shing la 'phan rings bsgrang ba ni /
translated: Hanging banners on a banner pole:

original: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten 'phul ba zhes bya'o //🔽mchod rten bye ba gdab pa'i cho ga ste /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten 'phul ba zhes bya'o // mchod rten bye ba gdab pa'i cho ga ste /
translated: This is called offering the stūpas containing the relics of the Tathāgatas of the three times.🔽The ritual for planting ten million stūpas:

original: mchod rten gdab pa'i cho ga'o//
analyzed: mchod rten gdab pa'i cho ga'o//
